entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 25 March 2023
